item.title: How ChatGPT made my son laugh - and why it is important
item.description: Recently I installed Marvin . Now, Marvin also happens to be the name of a dog dear to our family. So my kids kind of feel strongly about the name, and were both a bit offended about an Artificial Intelligence with the same name. But in this case Marvin is a batteries-included library for building AI-powered software. Marvin’s job is to integrate AI directly into your codebase by making it look and feel like any other function.

item.title: Is ChatGPT more than a glorified Markov chain? Here is what ChatGPT itself has to say about that
item.description: Me: is chatgpt really just a glorified markov chain ChatGPT: ChatGPT is a type of language model that is based on the transformer architecture, which is a neural network-based approach to natural language processing. While the Markov Chain is a mathematical model that can be used to generate text, it is a relatively simple model compared to neural network-based models like ChatGPT. ChatGPT is trained on a massive amount of text data and uses a deep neural network with multiple layers to learn patterns in the data.
